ComicInfo.Title: Black Light District, Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
Sector One is under the savage rule of the Dark Judges. The Council of Five has gone underground to survive. And the rest of Mega-City One has been taken over by Judge Cal, who sees this as the perfect opportunity to institute a few tiny changes to your average citizen’s liberty, safety and security. Only Judge Dredd and a barely-alive Cassandra Anderson are able to slip through the borders, leaving them the unenviable task of preventing hell on earth and the mad reign of a despot!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Kelsey Shannon | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Jeffrey Veregge | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-09-07 09:21:21. [CVDB465863]
ComicInfo.Characters: Chief Judge Cal, Chief Judge Griffin, Chief Judge McGruder, Judge Anderson, Judge Death, Judge Dredd, Judge Fear, Judge Fire, Judge Mortis, Judge Omar
ComicInfo.Teams: Council of Five, Dark Judges, Judges of Mega-City One, Special Judicial Squad
ComicInfo.Locations: Earth, Mega-City One, North America, Sector One, Space, Titan
